parameter.name: accountId
parameter.description: Account ID to retrieve the filter for.

parameter.name: type
parameter.description: Type of this filter. Possible values are INCLUDE, EXCLUDE, LOWERCASE, UPPERCASE, SEARCH_AND_REPLACE and ADVANCED.

parameter.name: advancedDetails
parameter.description: An object containg advacne details of the filter.

parameter.name: excludeDetails
parameter.description: The object which contains excluding details of the filter.

parameter.name: includeDetails
parameter.description: The object containing include details of the filter.

parameter.name: lowercaseDetails
parameter.description: Details for the filter of the type LOWER.

parameter.name: searchAndReplaceDetails
parameter.description: Details for the filter of the type SEARCH_AND_REPLACE.

parameter.name: uppercaseDetails
parameter.description: Details for the filter of the type UPPER.

parameter.name: callback
parameter.description: Name of the JavaScript callback function that handles the response.

parameter.name: prettyPrint
parameter.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

parameter.name: userIp
parameter.description: IP address of the end user for whom the API call is being made.

parameter.name: fields
parameter.description: The fields which the response should show.

parameter.name: filterId
parameter.description: ID of the filter to update.
